DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess coagulation change occur labor patient undergo non-elective ( intrapartum ) Cesarean delivery use thromboelastography ( TEG ) . TEG point- of-care device measure viscoelastic property clot formation . This device provide rapid detailed information coagulation change perioperative period . DOC.criteria: Obstetric inpatient Laboring patient Epidurals Labor Analgesia go nonelective Cesarean Patients ethnic background include Singleton pregnancy ASA 1 2 Patients underlying coagulation disorder . Patients thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 100 ) . Patients pregnancyinduced hypertension , preeclampsia . Patients require follow medication prior surgery : NSAIDS , aspirin , anticoagulant . Patients require elective Cesarean delivery . Patients significant obstetric medical disease . No patient < 18 year age recruit .
